description: This file, touchstone.h, is a C header file defining the interface to the Touchstone integration library. It declares functions for checking activation and running status, retrieving and setting server hostname, resetting to factory defaults, and restarting the system, all related to the Touchstone system.

methods.name: touchstoneIsActivated
methods.description: Checks if the Touchstone system is currently activated.

methods.name: touchstoneIsRunning
methods.description: Checks if the Touchstone system is currently running.

methods.name: touchstoneGetServerHostname
methods.description: Retrieves the hostname of the server Touchstone would activate and communicate with.

methods.name: touchstoneSetServerHostname
methods.description: Attempts to set the hostname of the server Touchstone will activate against.
